About Me

Welcome to my corner of the digital world. I'm a Ghebrehiwet H.Hagos with a passion for software development. Here's a little snapshot of who I am:

Welcome to My World!

Hello and thank you for stopping by! I'm thrilled to have this opportunity to share a bit about myself with you. I'm passionate about Front-end, backend and full-stack software development, and this space is where I unfold my journey, experiences, and the things that drive my curiosity.

CTTC, Asmara, Eritrea

Software Developer and Database Administrator

I am passionate about leveraging technology to create innovative solutions, and my role at CTTC allows me to blend my skills as a Software Developer and Database Administrator. I thrive on tackling complex challenges and contributing to the development of robust software systems.

Professional Experience:

In my role at CTTC, I play a pivotal role in database managment and developing software. Whether it's designing and implementing scalable software solutions or ensuring the efficiency and security of databases, I am committed to delivering high-quality results.

Key Technologies:

My expertise spans HTML, CSS, mySQL, microsoft access, C# and java â€” tools that empower me to streamline processes, enhance user experiences, and contribute to the overall success of our projects.

Eritrea Institute of technology

Assistant Lecturer

I am thrilled to be a part of the dynamic academic community here at Eritrea Inistitut of technology. As an Assistant Lecturer in the Computer Science Department, I bring a deep passion for programming and general ICT tasks and a commitment to fostering an engaging and collaborative learning environment.

Academic Background:

I hold a Masters degree in computer vision and patter recognition from Lappeenranta university of technology. My academic journey has been complemented by hands-on experience in machine learning, image recognition and data analiysis.

Courses and Specializations:

In my role, I will be teaching courses such as Object oriented programming, database, web development ... These courses are designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of programming and database and prepare them for success in their academic and professional pursuits.

Murata Electronics

Operating component testing

As a dedicated professional in the field of electronic component testing, I am honored to be a part of the esteemed team at Murata Electronics. With a strong background in operating testing machines and packing components. I bring a wealth of experience in ensuring the quality and reliability of electronic components.

Professional Experience:

My journey in the field of component testing has been marked by a commitment to precision and efficiency. At Murata Electronics, I actively contribute to the tempreture, calibrating, marking, seperation, packing and quality testing processes, focusing on sensors testing.

Key Responsibilities:

In my role, I am responsible for controlling the flow and operating the testing machines, ensuring that each component undergoes rigorous testing to meet the highest standards of quality. I work collaboratively with the team to address any testing challenges and contribute to the continuous improvement of our processes.

Technological Proficiency:

My expertise extends to calibration, packing, testing flow, qaulity assurance, allowing me to navigate the complexities of electronic component testing with precision. Staying abreast of technological advancements is a key aspect of my role to ensure our testing methodologies remain cutting-edge..
